backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom application with message storage, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage integration, and HTTP outcalls. Includes CRUD operations for chatrooms, messages, user presence tracking, and admin functions with password-protected deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single feature that updates ProfileSetupModal to calculate character count percentage during render instead of useEffect for instant progress bar updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including React components, hooks, pages, and configuration, detailing UI features like chat interface, message bubbles, avatar picker, profile setup, and styling with character limits and progress bars.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta directives, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting avatars via file upload or Giphy search with debounced search, trending GIFs fallback, upload progress handling, and avatar removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll on new messages, reply context handling, message highlighting on scroll-to, and message input integration.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media attachment options (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video URLs, or Twitter posts). Validates media URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter embed previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, back-to-lobby button (when in chatroom), and user profile section featuring inline username editing with character limit progress bar and avatar picker dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced to keep the app anonymous.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, and media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, images, voice messages). Supports pinning/unpinning videos, adding/removing emoji reactions, replying to messages, and highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with textarea for text, media attachment tabs (image upload, video URL, Twitter URL), voice recording functionality with timer, and validation for different media types. Handles file uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) in an iframe with an unpin button, rendered at the top of the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup, allowing username entry (max 15 chars) and avatar selection from 6 preset options, storing data in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with play/pause controls, waveform visualization (40 bars), time slider, and playback synchronization that pauses other audio elements when playing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates for a specified time (default 300ms).
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges legacy/empty chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch when the actor becomes ready, exposing a recovery-in-progress signal to prevent stale empty arrays from blocking the lobby.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable idle options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations (get, search, filter by category, send messages, reactions) with localStorage-based user identity management and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including color schemes for UI components, sidebar, and charts. Also includes mobile-specific input styles and custom voice message player range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Giphy API integration module providing functions to search GIFs and fetch trending GIFs with error handling and result formatting.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty module file, likely a placeholder for html2canvas dynamic loading functionality.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and compresses images while preserving quality and orientation, with progress callbacks and fallback to original if compression fails or increases file size.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty module file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Twitter oEmbed preview utility that fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, images) with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage-based cache manager for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and cache key generation using tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty module file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty module file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Comprehensive utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips, VODs, live streams), and Twitter/X posts, including URL validation and embed URL generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms with password authentication, filtering, and search functionality. Uses session storage to persist authentication state and displays chatrooms in a table with delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Individual chatroom page that loads and displays a specific chatroom by ID, handles view count incrementing, and shows loading/error states. Renders the ChatArea component when chatroom data is available.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying all chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering. Includes a create chatroom dialog and uses debounced search with category badges for filtering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting feature requests to update character count progress bars across multiple components (CreateChatroomDialog, MessageInput, ChatroomCard) to calculate percentages during render instead of using useEffect.
